text: Meyyakave ‘sapa'vacikal vacittirunta itattil avarkalukku nallator attatciyiruntatu. (Atan valiyakac celpavarkalukku) valappuramakavum itappuramakavum iru colaikal iruntana. ‘‘Unkal iraivan unkalukku arul purintavarraip puciyunkal; avanukku nanri celuttunkal. (Im'maiyil) valamana nakaramum, (marumaiyil) mikka mannipputaiya iraivanum (unkalukku) untu'' (enavum kurappattatu)
